name: Bitsy Disabled Voting
description:
This is an adventure game about a disabled person going to vote. The purpose of the project is to show a little bit about the problems disabled people have when going to vote. A good portion of places in Illinois do not have easy access for disabled people. I showed this through out the game and some examples of this are having an uber pick you up, finding an elevator can be like going through a maze, not all doors have an automatic button to open them. The game is supposed to feel a little tiresome going back and forth as to also add to the experience. 

I hope you enjoyed! 

If you would like to see more content that I have worked on check out my portfolio:

https://brandonf-portfolio.weebly.com/

Made by Brandon Figueroa
